metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36478 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS before 2.25.0 (and before 2.16.9 LTS and before 2.7.18 LTS). A NULL algorithm parameters entry looks identical to an array of REAL (size zero) and thus the certificate is considered valid. However, if the parameters do not match in any way, then the certificate should be considered invalid.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
